Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the photograph shows members of the U.S. government sitting during the recitation of the Pledge of Allegiance, when in fact it shows members of the New York State Senate.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photograph represents a regular occurrence of members of the U.S. government sitting during the Pledge of Allegiance, when in reality it captured an unusual interval of protest.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to back up its assertion that the photograph depicts members of the U.S. government sitting during the Pledge of Allegiance.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim fails to consider alternative explanations for why the members of the New York State Senate were sitting during the recitation of the Pledge of Allegiance, such as the protest that was taking place in the state legislature at the time.
